mapper.sql: select id, album_id, song_name, author_name, album_name, version, `language`, publish_date, wide_audio_id, is_publish, big_pack_id, final_id, audio_id, author_id, similar_audio_id, is_hot, album_audio_id, audio_group_id, cover, play_url, local_play_url, source_name, source_url, create_time, update_time, label, lyrics from music
mapper.select: select classify_name,classify_rank from music_classify group by classify_name,classify_rank order by classify_rank desc
select m.* from music_classify c left join music m on c.audio_id = m.audio_id where classify_name = #{classifyName} order by c.audio_rank desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
